CoriolisReloaded.StressRoll.title: Suppression
CoriolisReloaded.StressRoll.result_suppressed: Suppressed: The target suffers 1 stress and loses its next fast action
CoriolisReloaded.StressRoll.result_pinned: Pinned down: The target suffers 1 stress and loses its next slow action

CoriolisReloaded.PanicEffectApplied: Panic triggered â€“ Duration is rolled (1d6 turns)
CoriolisReloaded.Effect.panicDescription: As you suffer stress, your MP is reduced. If something reduces your MP to zero, you panic. Your character may collapse into uncontrollable sobs or go catatonic. You may crawl but cannot perform any other actions or roll for any skills. After 1d6 rounds, you regain some control of yourself and recover 1 MP.
CoriolisReloaded.Effect.suppressedDescri: You are suppressed. Suffer 1 stress and lose your next fast action.
CoriolisReloaded.Effect.pinnedDescriptio: You are pinned. Suffer 1 stress and lose your next slow action.

CoriolisReloaded.traitlinker.settings.enabled.name: Trait Linker active
CoriolisReloaded.traitlinker.settings.enabled.hint: Links weapon traits to journal pages of the same name

CoriolisReloaded.traitlinker.settings.traitJournalUUID.hint: UUID of the journal containing the weapon traits
